languages.text: "Довольно..." {n}Тазарра щерится, обнажая заостренные клыки.{/n} "Я вытрясу правду из мертвых тел — и твоего, и Маражая. Сестры, в атаку!"
"Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно..." {n}Тазарра щерится, обнажая заостренные клыки.{/n} "Я вытрясу правду из мертвых тел — и твоего, и Маражая. Сестры, в атаку!"

traits.locale_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"
"Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

"Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"
"Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

languages.text: 「もういい…」{n}タザーラは研ぎ澄まされた牙をむき出しにする。{/n}「真実は死体から引きずりだしてやる。貴様とマラズハイの死体からな。皆、かかれ！」
languages.original_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

traits.locale_text: 「もういい…」{n}タザーラは研ぎ澄まされた牙をむき出しにする。{/n}「真実は死体から引きずりだしてやる。貴様とマラズハイの死体からな。皆、かかれ！」

languages.text: “够了……”{n}塔扎菈露出了锋利的尖牙。{/n}“我会从从你和玛拉斋的尸体中拷问出真相。姐妹们，上！”
languages.original_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

traits.locale_text: “够了……”{n}塔扎菈露出了锋利的尖牙。{/n}“我会从从你和玛拉斋的尸体中拷问出真相。姐妹们，上！”

languages.text: «Basta...». {n}Tazarra te enseña sus afilados colmillos.{/n} «Arrancaré la verdad de vuestros cadáveres, el tuyo y el de Marazhai, a golpes. ¡Hermanas, al ataque!».
languages.original_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

traits.locale_text: «Basta...». {n}Tazarra te enseña sus afilados colmillos.{/n} «Arrancaré la verdad de vuestros cadáveres, el tuyo y el de Marazhai, a golpes. ¡Hermanas, al ataque!».

languages.text: « Ça suffit, {n}dit Tazarra en dévoilant ses canines affûtées.{/n} Vos cadavres me livreront tous vos secrets, ainsi que ceux de Marazhai. Mes sœurs, à l'attaque ! »
languages.original_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, {n}dit Tazarra en dévoilant ses canines affûtées.{/n} Vos cadavres me livreront tous vos secrets, ainsi que ceux de Marazhai. Mes sœurs, à l'attaque ! »

languages.text: "Genug ..." {n}Tazarra entblößt ihre geschliffenen Fangzähne.{/n} "Ich werde die Wahrheit aus Euren Leichen herausprügeln – Euer und der von Marazhai. Schwestern, Attacke!"
languages.original_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

traits.locale_text: "Genug ..." {n}Tazarra entblößt ihre geschliffenen Fangzähne.{/n} "Ich werde die Wahrheit aus Euren Leichen herausprügeln – Euer und der von Marazhai. Schwestern, Attacke!"

languages.text: "Yeter..." {n}Tazarra, keskin pençelerini çıkarıyor.{/n} "Hakikati ölü bedenlerinizden söküp alacağım. Marazhai'ın da senin de. Kardeşlerim, saldırın!"
languages.original_text: "Enough..." {n}Tazarra bares her sharpened fangs.{/n} "I will beat the truth out of your dead bodies — yours and Marazhai's. Sisters, attack!"

traits.locale_text: "Yeter..." {n}Tazarra, keskin pençelerini çıkarıyor.{/n} "Hakikati ölü bedenlerinizden söküp alacağım. Marazhai’nin de, senin de. Kardeşlerim, saldırın!"
